unauthorizedPage.title: You do not have permission to access the requested page
unauthorizedPage.description: Either go back to the previous page or log in as a different user.

notFoundPage.heading: The page you're looking for couldn't be found
notFoundPage.description: Check the web address and try again. Or go back to the previous page.

technicalError.heading: Oops!
technicalError.description: Something went wrong. Please try again.
